title: Cannot get file extension from swt FileDialog
description: The inability to retrieve file extensions from the SWT FileDialog is causing issues with determining the correct file extension to append to the file name, making the dialog almost unusable.
OB: The JAR export wizard uses 'test' for the JAR file field.
EB: The JAR export wizard should use 'test.zip' for the JAR file field when this happens.
SR:
1) Select a java file
2) Select File > Export...
3) Select JAR file and press Next
4) Press Browse... to select a 'Save As' file dialog
5) Enter 'test' for the file name
6) Select '.zip' for the 'Save as type' field
7) Press Save
